 & so much more!

EARLY ACCESS INFORMATION:

As an solo indie developer, your early access purchase allows me to focus on chapter two and beyond which you will get for free in a future update (EP 02). The second chapter is much longer & grander in scale in both story and game play, taking place directly after the events from chapter one.

name: War Yards
summary: Engage in intense 1v1 multiplayer duels with unique bullet time mechanics.
description:
PLEASE NOTE: YOU NEED TO RESTART THE APP AFTER ACCEPTING MICROPHONE PERMISSIONS ON THE FIRST LAUNCH

War Yards is a 1v1 multiplayer shooter that approaches bullet time combat in a whole new way. The game utilizes a unique set of mechanics that allow each player to control the speed of their opponent’s projectiles. Bullet time mode can be activated at any time, but while active it restricts the player to room-scale movement only and removes their ability to reload. These mechanics create an unparalleled combat experience that seamlessly blends fast paced action with tense strategy. War Yards combines these innovative gameplay systems with incredibly detailed stylized maps to make for a truly unforgettable VR western adventure.

Features
- Challenge your friends to intense and highly strategic 1v1 duels.

- Utilize incredibly unique multiplayer bullet time mechanics to outsmart your opponent.

- Explore 4 highly detailed stylized maps inspired by classic western settings.

- Enjoy the freedom of playing with users across nearly all VR platforms.

**[Join Us On Discord](https://discord.gg/cEezgFB)**

name: Rhythm 'n Bullets
summary: An arcade SHMUP where the music is part of the action
description:
## App Description

SideQuest demo is free, purchase paid version on [Oculus Store](https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/3531906180264612/)

Travel across the virtual zone and defend the core by guiding a pair of starfighters through the shoot 'em up action of Rhythm 'n Bullets. Enemies fly in from all sides, diving towards the core in time with the soundtrack. Time your shots to the beat for maximum effect, and grab awesome power-ups to clear the stage.

Keep the Core safe from danger in the multi-level campaign, and then try to top the leaderboards in endless mode, where the enemies never stop! Hone your skills in relax mode, or just chill out to the music. 

Join our [Discord](https://discord.gg/UzrFjFa) to work with us to improve the game and get early access to our future projects.

#### Paid Release
- Full paid game release
- Theme 3 (Space), Theme 4 (Holiday Forest)
- Campaign Level 3
- Phase 3 Boss

#### Post-Launch Content (Paid)
- Theme 5 (Underwater)
- Challenge Mode

#### Demo (Available free on SideQuest)
- Campaign Level 2
- Phase 2 Boss
- Laser powerup
- Gameplay adjustments based on feedback

name: RealFit (VR fitness)
summary: Real Fitness in Virtual Reality - RealFit offers bodyweight training workouts and games in virtual reality
description:
## RealFit - Stay active with fun and effective exercise in VR

Bodyweight training exercises and games to get you moving your whole body - no need for extra equipment or expensive gym memberships!

RealFit is a perfect compliment to cardio content like Beat Saber since it covers a wide variety of bodyweight training exercises for the whole body.


# Highlights

1. Get started **fast** - choose from one of our preset cardio or strength training workouts
2. Get moving **how you want** - build your own custom workout from the exercises and mini games you most enjoy
3. See your **progress** - create a profile to store your stats and make the most of VR fitness with real-time feedback as you work out

4. With RealFit you can play **and** exercise! - exercise-based mini games get you moving as you play


# About Early Access:

We're actively developing RealFit based on feedback from our Early Access users, come join us!

RealFit already has pleanty of content to get you moving *right now* but we're also creating a whole lot more features, content and mini games as we work towards a full release. You can read more about Early Access on our Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1346300/RealFit/

# Workout Features
### • 6 preset strength/cardio workouts
### • 21 exercises in library
_plus popular variations for some exercises, like knee push ups_
### • Flappy Birds minigame
_play by doing push ups, squats or (soon) as a seated exercise_
### • Bubble Pop warm up
collect time to stop the bomb from exploding! A fund game that gets you moving *and* tests your coordination skills.
### • Custom Workouts
_ability to build custom workouts using any of the exercises/minigame in the library_
### • Workout Statistics
_scores for each workout and timing or rep-count metrics for all exercises and games_

## RealFit profile to save your stats and custom workouts
Access your RealFit profile from multiple devices (friends can log in to use their profile on your device too while keeping your stats seperated)

_Without a profile you can also use RealFit in guest mode_

_You can find our Privacy Policy at https://www.realfit.co/privacy-policy and terms of service at https://www.realfit.co/terms-of-service if you'd like to review these_


# Chat with us

Burpee (or just burp) onto our Discord server (https://realfit.chat)! We'd love to say hi, answer any questions and hear your feedback!

name: Transformer Oil Sampling VR Training
summary: VR training for electrical technicians where they can practice the transformer oil sampling procedure in accordance with existing sampling methods.
description:
Transformer Oil Sampling VR Training

Through the training attendees are given a task to perform a preventive maintenance procedure — transformer oil sampling. Participants are invited to collect the necessary tools and step-by-step carry out the sampling procedure for transformer oil of voltage class 110 kV


What Skill Do You Acquire After Completing

After successful completion attendees will be able to know what tools are required to perform transformer oil sampling, how to set up a workspace, be aware of all safety considerations and requirements to be observed before and during sampling, connect fittings with an appropriate sized nipple to the sample point on the transformer, an appropriate amount of oil while cleaning the bottle and collecting the final sample.


VR Benefits Over Traditional Education

Employees who would otherwise be subject to training in harsh, high-risk circumstances can learn and make decisions in a physically-safe environment through VR. The safety factor alone can be enough to justify investment in VR due to the cost of accidents both in training and on the job. Heavy equipment doesn’t have to be brought to a special training location, or suer wear and tear as numerous trainees learn how to operate it.

Project Page: https://digitalengineeringmagic.com/vr-training/vr-training-transformer-oil-sampling

name: Smash Drums! demo
summary: Get ready to ROCK and DRUM HARD in this demo!
description:
(╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻ ##### What is Smash Drums? Smash Drums is an epic VR arcade drumming game featuring awesome rock music and environment destruction. Wake up in the middle of nowhere, and break free from nightmares!
In times where electronic music has taken over the VR scene, there's no stressing this enough:
Rock'n roll is not dead: **it's never been more alive!**

##### Scope of the demo (as of today) The purpose of this demo is to present a vertical slice of Smash Drums from the core gameplay loop: 1. One song: Lover Boy - Kid Dope 1. Four handmade tracks: easy, normal, hard, extreme 1. A leaderboard! 1. One level: the prison 1. A forward-facing mode (the "couch" mode) 1. Game modifiers (**faster** mode, no flying debris, barbarian) 1. A boring tutorial
##### Features and content for future updates of the demo 1. Another song? 1. A kickass tutorial! 1. Surprises
##### Features and content that will make it to the game upon release 1. 21 rock songs from very (very) talented indies 1. More environments 1. Drums & sticks customization and collectibles
##### Additional notes & how to give feedback Smash Drums is currently under development, and many features are yet to be finalized and adjusted according to players' feedbacks.
There are three options for feedback, and I will love you forever if you do so: 1. **NEW!** Discord: https://discord.gg/ypeuDAc (see social links on the page) 1. Twitter: my DMs are open, 1. e-mail: contact@smashdrums.com ### TL;DR: Play the demo and have fun! <3

name: Hyperstacks
summary: A frenetic Puzzle-Action game combined with a very powerful Level Editor for Unlimited Gameplay in VR.
description:
Climb, fight, dodge, think, create, share and play in this frenetic puzzle-action game  
Combined with a super-powerful level editor created for Oculus Quest.  
Create levels share them with your friends and Play with them\!  
Unlimited Gameplay is on the way!

Fight against foes, climb walls, solve puzzles, unleash your creative side,  
and create your own levels, enjoy community-created content and,  
game modes, compete, or cooperate with other players! All in one!
  
Wishlist on Steam if you have PCVR 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1046760/Hyperstacks/
  

### FEATURES
* ***Level editor*** - Create deadly levels in VR and interact with the community!  
* ***Community-Based*** - Monthly-Featured levels, ideas, and much more!  
* ***Melee and Ranged Combat*** - Crush your foes with your own combat style!  
* ***Full VR Movement*** - Move any direction even up or down.  
* ***Deadly traps*** - Just.. just don't touch anything pink.  
* ***Multiplayer (2021 Q1)*** - Play or create levels with your friend! or compete with them\!  
* ***Epic bosses (TBA)*** - Fight against a great variety of bosses that will make your life a living hell.  

  
  
### EARLY ACCESS 
This game is in development.  
All news, info, gifs, and progress, are shared in our Discord server\!  

 [***JOIN OUR DISCORD HERE***](https://discord.gg/squirrelbytes) 

By joining our discord server you can help us with the development of the game by giving us feedback and reporting bugs, also you can see the game development of the game and get important news about Hyperstacks.

We also organize contests and events with sweet rewards\!  
So keep an eye and be part of our community, your word is important for us!

After playing it would be really nice if you fill this feedback form\!  
https://forms.gle/CxUy5G5KNm5inZVPA  

You can also access to the evolving Good Community levels guideline so you can learn what makes a good level in Hyperstacks  
https://github.com/Extrys/HyperstacksGuidelines  

***ENJOY!***


### NOTE
You will be using PC Post processing so if you want a Boost on performance just disable it by pressing A or X and touching "PostProcess"
it will disable it and will make the game runn smoother

name: Ancient Dungeon
summary: Ancient Dungeon is a rogue-like dungeon crawler with randomly generated dungeons. Uncover its secrets and challenge powerful bosses!
description:
Join the Discord for more information, bug reports and experimental versions: https://discord.gg/h55qm34

Do you have PCVR? Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1125240/Ancient_Dungeon_VR/

Grab your gear and delve into the dungeons of this rogue-lite dungeon crawler, Ancient Dungeon VR, and uncover its secrets. Fight through hordes of different monsters with your sword and your throwing knife and collect tons of different powerups along the way to improve them and change their behaviour. Find and rescue friendly NPCs along your journey that can help you out in future runs by selling you different upgrades and perks for the right price. Challenge difficult and powerful bosses. Every dungeon you visit is procedurally generated, which means, each run is different from the last one! Do you have what it takes to find out what lies below?

All dungeons you encounter in your playthrough are randomly generated and filled with traps, secrets, semi-bosses and tons of different kinds of loot. The deeper you go the more dangerous the environment and the enemies will get. There are differently themed dungeons that you'll encounter, for example the Overgrown Dungeon, that features a lot of vegetation and plant based enemies or the Infernal Dungeon, that features fire based enemies. But not all of your runs will encounter the same dungeons as there are multiple paths that you can take to get to different and hidden places.

name: Mythic Mage
summary: A procedurally generated dungeon crawler
description:
Explore endless dungeons! Battle epic monsters! Find shiny treasure!

Mythic Mage is an action game with RPG elements set in a procedurally generated dungeon. Fight monsters using melee or ranged attacks! Upgrade your stats between dungeons! How far can you get before you perish?

name: Virtuoso
summary: Play music in Virtual Reality!
description:
Virtuoso is the new way to make music in VR! Unleash your creativity by playing on virtual instruments and using your voice. Record and create anything from satisfying ambient droning to hip hop or upbeat techno as you go. The sky's the limit for what you can put into your music, but even as a beginner you’ll feel like a Virtuoso.

Rather than trying to imitate the music making experience you’re used to, Virtuoso has six unique instruments with countless sounds that are designed to work in VR. Whether you’re a seasoned creator or a complete beginner, all you really need is a drive to create. Tools such as the tempo sync and scale presets help you to stay on beat and in key, so you can focus on making music.

Key features:
- Six instruments made to work in VR, including the three-dimensional Oorgan and the Wavemin
- Responsive drum pads that can be resized and placed however you like to create your own kit
- Awesome synth sounds and effects that you can tweak intuitively with your controllers while playing  
- Virtual microphone allows you to sing, beat-box or rap to your music
- Live loop-station that makes creating loops quick and easy for building your track as you go
- Connect to any music program using MIDI over network with a lightweight companion app

name: NP Skills Labs
summary: Nurse Practicioner Skills Labs for NP Students and Professionals
description:
>>> Needs License to Use: Only students with licenses will be able to use the app.

Nurse Practitioner students work virtually, “anytime, anywhere”, to develop and demonstrate clinical lab skills required for their degree program.  The immersive learning enterprise provides unlimited access to practice, immediate feedback regarding learning outcomes, and predictive analytics for individual skills gaps.

name: Hitstream
summary: Punch, hit, swing, dodge, and move in this fast paced outdoor 360' arcade exercise game.
description:
Here is an Alpha demo of my developing exercise game, which I have been creating in my [very limited] spare time, starting in Feb 2020. This is my first VR game and first creation in Unity. Ive been learning to code as I go along. The graphics and gameplay are subject to change as I continue to develop the ideas, so some of the screenshots and videos may not be the same as version here.

This game features:
- Full 360' body rotation
- Breathtaking outdoor backdrops from around the world
- Choreographed movements to hand-selected music tracks

I play other games of this type, and wanted to take advantage of the Quest's unteathered nature; by moving in full 360 degree's, it means you have to move your legs as well as arms. I also wanted to create something which featured the outdoors; given most games of this type feel 'enclosed'.

Initially developed for the Quest, but I hope to be able to release on other VR platforms as I get futher into the project.

name: Rest In Pieces - SideQuest
summary: Fight against Hordes of Demons and send them Rest In Pieces!
description:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
NOTE : " REST IN PIECES will be on Permanent 50% Discount " Enjoy mates!
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

NEW UPDATES
1.35 : Graphic Improvements on Quest 2
(1.30) : Support for 90Hz on Quest 2

*UPDATES*

-1.05 : Improved Graphics/Textures/Resolution

-1.10 : fixed blurry textures + fixed "white circle" 

-1.16 : ​ To compensate for the loss of your progress for updating to 1.15 or later, you can go to Options/Support and click on ONE TIME CHEAT, this will grant you 30 Level and 100.000 Souls.​

-1.20 : fixed blue/fire portals , Performance improvements

-1.30 : Native 90hz support , optimizations


BACKGROUND STORY

Life as we know doesn’t exist, hordes of undead and demons have emerged and now rule the earth. The human race was forced to live in underground shelters in order to survive. To take what used to be theirs, humanity gathered forces and established small specialised teams to eliminate the threat. This action was called Project Rest in Pieces, aka R.I.P .

Killing the undying would not be enough, instead humanity developed an extremely advanced AI technology to manipulate specialized forces, now called “Agents”, in order to command from headquarters.

Using this advanced technology, AI called by project’s name “R.I.P.”, managed to capture the leftover souls of the undead to perform improvements on Agents gear, weaponry, but also on their strength and abilities.

Now it’s up to you, to save what remains...

MAIN FEATURES
- Locomotion Movement and Weapon Mechanics
- Blood & Gore Dismemberments
- Multiplatform Global Scoreboards to compete with other Players
- 20 Weapons to choose from and upgrade their stats and skins
- Melee combat from knife to Katana
- 6 Specialized Perks to use in combat
- 8 Agents to choose, with leveling system
- 34 Avatars for prestige
- Choose VR body or VR hands mode
- Customizable HUD/Controls and more
- PickUp items to boost your efficiency
- 3 Mission type Levels
- 3 Horde Mode Maps 
- 5 Difficulty levels
- Training/Tutorial level
- AAA Quality Graphics
- Outstanding Sound effects and Music

Make humanity’s last stand.

GAMEPLAYS : 

- VR REVIEWS YT : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yHxpJhOT5oM&feature=youtu.be
- TOP 5 Zombie Shooters : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JwcV6lh_y9c&ab_channel=VRReviews


PLEASE NOTE : Rest in Pieces gunfight is not focused on realistic weapon handling. It is made to provide an arcadish quakish/doomish gunfight for quick and fun killstreaks.


*Shooting mechanics include Blood and Dismemberments by default. This feature can be turned Off from Options Menu - General - Blood & Gore

name: Escape Legacy - SideQuest
summary: Explore numerous rooms and locations, find hidden items,clues and escape before time runs out!
description: NOTE : GAME WILL BE ON PERMANENT 50% DISCOUNT. HAVE FUN! Update 1.35 : Optimizations for Quest 1 NEW UPDATE (1.30) : native support for 90hz on Quest 2 You Play as Erica who follows the adventurous steps of her grandfather. Find all Ancient Scrolls while you trying to make your way to the escape door. Solve series of Puzzles and riddles! Explore numerous rooms and locations, find hidden items,clues and escape before time runs out! Play with a new fresh type of Realistic Gameplay for escape rooms! Forget about Old casual escape room or point and click games... BE IN THE ROOM! Begin your Adventure today and make your True Escape! FEATURES - Movement : Locomotion/RoomScale/Teleport - Amazing High Detailed Graphics - Puzzles and Items Change Every Time you Play - 10 Levels with 80+ Rooms to explore - Over 10 Hours of Gameplay - Challenging Puzzles - Thrilling Music and Sound Effects - Player Interactive Gaming Enviroment - Intelligent Inventory System - Unique Scoring system with Global Scoreboards *Please Note that a network connection is also required for submitting your scores. *Game Progress is stored Localy, please backup before uninstalling. Thank you for choosing to Play Escape Legacy! VERSION HISTORY : 1.02 : possible storage permissions fix + 25% Thumbstick deadzone 1.05 : added ScaleableVR Option + fixed lighting on Chapter 3 1.10 : Added Teleportation , fixed blocked Stairs on Chapter 9 1.12 : Fixed Gears Puzzle on Chapter 2 1.16 : Unlock All feature 1.17 : fixed blocked Stairs on Chapter 10 1.20 : fixed "lock auto-minimize" 1.30 : 90hz support, teleportation fixes 1.35 : Improved performance on Quest 1 for stable 72Hz GAMEPLAYS : - VR REVIEWS YT : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XX-zRlPdvgk&feature=youtu.be ------------------------------------------------------------------------ >>>Some Quick Notes for Players<<< - Randomized Puzzles and Items : each time you start a level all puzzles and items are auto generated, so don't expect to use the same ones each time you play. This will provide some kind of replayability. - Interactions are done with either pressing Trigger which uses VR Hand position or by holding the Grip and Point with Laser to the object and pressing Trigger - Laser Colors : A. Red : means you aren't able to interact with the object yet B. Yellow : means you are too far from the object to interact C. Green : interaction is possible *There are some rare cases where laser interaction wont be possible, you may want to step away from the object and try again pointing on it. - UI ONLY INTERACTIONS : some objects, like Electronic Passwords or Locks may be interacted only with the use of Laser Pointer (Hold Grip) - Inventory : You may check and inspect items you have collected. The usage of items is done automatically, also when an item is used it will be removed from inventory. - Difficulties : Playing on Easy will not result in a loss, even if time runs out. However on Normal/Hard you have less time and when time runs out it will result in a loss. Playing on higher levels will provide bigger score bonuses. - Saving : Progress is saved ONLY when you Complete a level. This will Unlock next Level and current level's difficulty. - Gems : gems will provide (depending on color) score bonuses, thus this item is auto-consumed and it will not appear on inventory. - Statues : same as gems but this time they provide extra Time. - Papers/Letters : some papers can be collected, but other will not. Also you may notice that when you complete a puzzle some papers will dissapear, this is normal as they are no longer needed. That's All! Enjoy!

name: Speed Cube
summary: The classic puzzle now in VR!
description:
Learn how to solve a cube, practice your skills, and compete with others to become the fastest cuber!

Current Features:
- Free play
- Competitive mode with leaderboards
- Automatic shuffler and solver
- Simple solving guider

Planned Features:
- More in depth tutorial and solving algorithms
- Cube and environment customizations

Press trigger and grip button to grab the cube via a controller, and just the grip to rotate a side.
Hold a fist to grab the cube via hand tracking, and pinch to rotate a side.
Make a fist to pickup the whole cube, and pinch to grab a side.

name: Arcaxer Pre-Release
summary: Arcaxer is an action turn based RPG inspired by games like Paper Mario and Undertale.
description:
### A Turn Based Action RPG!

#### Try the demo first! https://sidequestvr.com/app/549/arcaxer-demo

Important! This is the Pre-Release version of Arcaxer. This version features more content than the demo version but is still in development and is not a finished game.

Arcaxer is a turn based RPG with first person action oriented combat, and a 3rd person god-view overworld. In the overworld you will explore procedural dungeons to find equips and new abilities for your character. You can also explore the hub world to interact with NPC's and buy new items with the credits that you earn in the dungeon.

Even though combat is turn based you must dodge enemy attacks with your body, and aim and time your own attacks with gestures. Can you make it to the top of "The Stack"?

#### Player Classes Choose fighter, thief, or mage to drastically change which abilities you learn as you explore the dungeons.

Fighter: A class with a focus on physical attacks

Mage: A class with a focus on Hax, the game's special abilities.

Thief: A class that requires skill and precision to use properly

#### Procedurally Generated Dungeons The Stack is a huge procedurally generated dungeon filled with random enemies and loot. The dungeon changes as you get higher including more dangerous traps and enemies. This is an early demo of a game in development and may have bugs, balance, and performance issues.

#### Join the discord to get early builds and more! https://discord.gg/BCqy2m3
#### Latest Major Update: 1.31.0

Key Changes:


* Barkaxer! He's a little dog that follow you around! * New enemy art. * New defensive abilities. Spend adrenaline to avoid taking damage on the enemy turn! * Accessory Equips with very powerful passives!

If you enjoy the game please leave feedback at :
http://www.reddit.com/r/Arcaxer

Also if you want to support development consider donating for preview builds with more content!
https://www.patreon.com/Arcaxer

name: White Hole
summary: White Hole is a rogue like game made for the Oculus Quest. The game is for now at the stage of an Alpha release
description:
A shadow lurks deep in space, getting closer and closer to planet Earth. If
you want to rescue your homeworld, you must forge your own ship and
go explore the infinite universe to discover ancient civilizations and
unearth the clues that will help you find out how to fight this new evil.

Build and customize your own ship as you want with a multitude of
components that will completely change how you deal with all the
situations encountered in this unexplored part of the void. You can meet
a lot of adversity in the universe and you will need to fight your way out,
negotiate with the different powers ruling the place to make the most of
the situation, solve some deadly enigmas and decrypt mysteries to learn
about the most hidden galaxy’s secrets. Will the Earth survive its ordeal
or will it get destroyed once and for all ? That’s all up to you !

White Hole uses the guardian system to build your ship, you need to use a roomscale guardian in order to play the game.

name: OPERATION SERPENS
summary: ARCADE SHOOTER
description:
###### If you are looking for an arcade style shooter with loads of action, then this is the game to play!  
In Operation Serpens you will join an elite squad that formed to dismantle the evil Snakes > Organization.  
Each level will present a new challenge in a slightly different style.  
Show off your skills, eliminate enemies, avoid bullets and defeat them all!  
  
###### Features  
* Fast paced action game with great arcade feel.  
* Challenging without being impossible.  
* Lots of guns, grenades, flashbangs and hidden items.  
* Headshots, recoil, climbing and riot shields.  
* Single player campaign story.  
* Zombies survival horde mode with leaderboard.  
* Epic wave shooter with tons of funny moments.  
* Immersive VR Experience that is friendly towards new VR users.  
* bHaptics support. Suit up!  
* 90Hz support

name: Adventure Thru Inner Space- Project: Snowflake - Quest Edition
summary: Come experience one of Disneyland's extinct attractions, Adventure Thru Inner Space
description:
From 1967 until 1985, guests at Disneyland had the opportunity to ”travel into the incredible universe found within a tiny fragment of a snowflake."  The attraction, Adventure Thru Inner Space, sought to use the tools of cinematic set design to explore the lessons of science, with massive structures representing water molecules and elaborate projection revealing the microscopic world of the atom.  The ride was developed during Walt Disney's final years, when he repeatedly explored how the tools of filmmaking might be repurposed to explore worlds beyond cinema in his theme park. Adventure Thru Inner Space was groundbreaking not only in introducing the Omnimover and by creating an attraction almost wholly focused on backgrounds (with no characters except for the onboard narration) but in the way it arranged dramatic, themed space toward educational goals.  

Several years ago we released a beta version of this software; in recent months, we have worked to arrange an updated version worthy of a wide public release. The time for that release has come. Now you have the ability to experience this extinct Disneyland attraction on your  Oculus Quest. So join us as we journey back in time to look at--what was then imagined--as the future of science.

Development Team:
Jeremy Marx
Kurt Pfeifer

name: Liminal
summary: Choose how you feel and perform: Calm, Energy, Pain Relief and Awe.
description:
Alter your state of mind and choose how you feel and perform. 

Explore a range of experiences which apply research by neuroscientists and psychologists to induce and augment emotional and cognitive states. 

There are currently four categories of experience: Calm, Energy, Pain Relief and Awe with new content and more categories to be released over time. 

Calming experiences are relaxing and beautiful, energizing experiences fun and invigorating, pain relief experiences are designed to make you more comfortable and awe experiences will leave you speechless. 

We track and display how effective each experience is based on user feedback so you can see how it has affected others.

Come back each week to try different experiences created by Liminal and our partners. You can also take part in interesting lab experiments to earn credits and unlock more content!

You can use the platform as a guest or sign up for free to get the most out of your Liminal experience, including earning credits, unlocking new experiences and much more!


- If you run into any issues, please email us at support@liminalvr.com and we will do our best to resolve it for you!

- New, free experiences are added EVERY WEEK - keep checking back for more!

name: Flowborne VR - Biofeedback Breathing Meditation
summary: The most playful breathing meditation. Experience your breath in VR. Meditative and deeply relaxing breathwork journeys with biofeedback.
description:
The most playful way of breathing. Meditative and deeply relaxing breathwork journeys.


Flowborne is a meditative biofeedback breathing game. It conveys a healthy breathing style in an intuitive and playful way. Your breath is used as a game controller. You place the controller on your belly and use your breath to move through the game world. Every inhale creates a magical path in front of you, every exhale propels you forward. The game takes you on 24 meditative journeys through fascinating and soothing environments. Let your breath move you and allow yourself to let go.


Flowborne is created by psychologists with stress reduction and relaxation in mind. It is based on scientific research on stress reduction, biofeedback and virtual reality. An empirically validated algorithm utilizes the hand controller to pick up the subtle respiration-induced abdominal movements. The virtual environment reacts to your breathing in real-time, thus guiding your attention and helping you to perfect your breathing style. Flowborne combines deep relaxation with meditative breathing.




We also created a smartphone version of Flowborne.

iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/flowborne-breathing-meditation/id1544753081

Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.vunderwelten.flowborneapp

name: Cactus Cowboy Portal VR
summary: Yes, it's a VR Portal knock off / VR FPS in the Cactus Cowboy Universe
description:
## Cactus Cowboy is back in Cactus Cowboy Portal VR!
First and foremost, yes, it's a Portal game but is this is Portal game you have been waiting for? Probably not, but I tried my very best to get close to it!
You're the Cactus Cowboy trying to escape out of the cacti labs with your portal revolvers while being tortured by something evil.

**6DoF Jump'n'Run / FPS Adventure containing:**

* Full Locomotion and nothing else
* Dual wielding Portalrevolvers

* Cacticubes

* Bombs

* Bossfights

* Deep falls and long jumps

* Portal based riddles

* 17 Labchambers

* GLADOS voice by https://15.ai

* Chiptune Soundtrack made by Trackerbernd

* Hidden eastereggs

* A blast from the past with Commodore Computers and Cracktros





A content of questionable quality production by me presents you what no one seems to make. Portals, full locomotion and jumping. This is not for greenhorns!



**Playtime:** About 1-3h depending on your skill

**Warning:** No comfort options and I'm certainly not going to make some. I can't really judge how hard this is on your stomach. Rule of thumb: If you can handle Boneworks you can handle this.


This is freeware. Assets are either made by myself, public domain or creative commons. So this is my 2nd VR and Unity game, so please be a wee bit considerate in your reviews




**Credits:**

*Programming and Design* Me

*Audio:*
Trackerbernd
fifteen.ai
Korobeiniki on NES by Rocavaco
snore - mattyharm

I hope you enjoy my litte game the new adventure of Cactus Cowboy :3

**Get the PCVR Version here:** https://dp-cactus.itch.io/cactus-cowboy-portal-vr

V1.02 * Minor Savegame bug that cause the savegame to set to Chamber 7 (okay, it was a dev cheat I forgot to remove) * Skip button for the credits
*V.1.03 HOTFIX* * Broke the save game mechanism! I'm sorry ;_;
V.1.03.2 Miniupdate * Minor beauty fixes and preparation for bonus levels



Want to support me? Feel free to buy me a beer on www.cactusvrstudios.com
The game will remain freeware either way

name: Harvest VR
summary: Let's get growing!
description:
# About the game

To the fields and beyond!

It's a beautiful day out here in the countryside. Might as well enjoy it doing your job. Grow some plants, sell some veggies, or head to town to buy some new tools for the farm.

Our goal is to release regular content updates, new mechanics, and tweaks to existing systems based on community feedback and discussions, so we would love for you to join us on our discord and help us shape this game!

https://discord.gg/mM2UsAF

# Features

* Enjoy the countryside.
* Grow more than 15 different kinds of plants.
* Sell vegetables to gain money and buy new tools.
* Work hard or hardly work.
* Work at day or night with the daynight cycle.
* Continue your journey with saving inside your house.
* Do some fishing.
* Do some cooking.
* Do some mining.
* Play with real time OR play with a faster simulated time.
* Unlock items for your house or the farm!

# Wiki

https://harvest-vr.fandom.com/wiki/Harvest_VR_Wiki

# Buy us a drink!

We spend a lot of time working on this in our free time. The game is free, but you can buy us a drink if you like to show some us some praise.

https://www.buymeacoffee.com/harvestvr

name: Crop Craze: VR Farming Simulator
summary: Crop Craze is the first fully immersive Virtual Reality farming simulator. Plant crops, feed animals, complete upgrades, and more in this brand-new game!​
description:
Crop Craze: Farming Simulator is now available on Oculus App Labs! Get it today for only $9.99 and experience the fun of managin yor own farm.

Installation instructions:
Click the [OCULUS APP] button. Buy the game through Oculus App Labs, which is the site that popped up after pressing that button. You can now install it to your headset and get autmatic updates!

In Crop Craze, PicoPlanetDev's new VR farming simulator, you can buy seeds, grow crops, and sell them. Experience a serene view of the countryside, and take a break from farming to roast marshmallows by the fire pit. Upgrade your farm to boost profit, as a bonus, add a greenhouse and raise animals too. Purchase more land and expand your farm, while managing your money and having fun!

Join the PicoPlanetDev Discord server (https://picoplanetdev.tk/discord.html) to get updates about Crop Craze.

name: Realms of Eternity
summary: 2021 #1 update released!
description:
VRKemono proudly presents "Realms Of Eternity"
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* Smooth and teleport locomotion.
* Flexible graphical settings.
* Highly optimized for VR.
* Responsive 24/7 support and discord channel.
* bHaptics support integrated.

**Early Access #1 release features Zen garden and 2 weapons mastery Kendo and Kyodo Dojos + Single player sneak peek.**

Kendo Dojo:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* You can master 1 or 2 handed various melee weapons.
* State of the art physics and interaction.
* Accurate cut and slice mechanics.
* Per object damage model.

Kyodo Dojo:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* Master way of bow with 30 waved minigame
* Static and dynamic targets
* Rapid difficulty curve
* Physically challenged, skill based and overall good workout
* 7 types of enemies, each with own tactics and abilities

Single Player Level:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* Portal is opened to new location
* Fight and depend new realm
* Flame arrows
* New Enemies
* Defeat mini boss

What do we propose ?
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
"Game development as service". We are professional game designers and skilled VR developers also an avid gamers. We want to make this and future games for you and for us, game that we all enjoy and love to play together. We have clear picture what this game is about and technical limitation of current VR technology, but we will try to get maximum out of it and polish every aspect as much as possible. We love to be interactive with our community involving them from the early stage of product creation that we strongly believe will only benefit our game and its audience together. Hence you have unique chance to participate in game development, vote for which features to include or how to tune them. For example should we have simulation grade melee or more arcade approach? Which kind of weapons would you like to be implemented together with well-known, exotic ones or some other. We will provide frequent builds and iterate each aspect as closely as possible.

About Us
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
VRKemono is a newly founded studio dedicated only to VR games and media. We have commercial game development and outsource experience on all major platforms. We are genuine pioneers and know how to design games professionally for VR that is still rather new medium. I look forward to hearing for your impressions and suggestions.

Lets start this journey together !

name: Car Parking Simulator
summary: Car Parking Simulator is a fully interactive, realistic and immersive car parking experience, propelling varied levels of escalating challenges, testing your abilities of car handling and parking to its fullest.
description:
Car parking Simulator is now available via APP LAP. If you have already bought the game then please update the game via itch.io or if you would like a key of APP LAP then please DM on our discord channel.

*** Game will get updates on both itch and App Lap *** Car Parking Simulator is a fully interactive, realistic and immersive car parking experience. The game has one of the best vehicle physics simulations in VR. Interact and experience the realistic and dynamic behavior of car handling and parking to its fullest. 

Explore the escalating levels of challenges across different terrains and captivating environments that are engaging and fun to drive on.

Features:

- City Mode with moving traffic

- 4 vehicle choices, ranging from SUV, Sedan, Hatchback, F1and more to come

- Different exhilarating environments in day and night cycles.

- Total 45 levels, giving you ratings based on your skills and challenge completion.

- Realistic and interactive car interiors.

- All cars have Right and Left Steering option

Controls :

- Utilize full power of 6 DOF Oculus Quest while driving the car

- Change gears using hands

- Take full control of steering with your hands

name: Puzzling Places - Beta
summary: Jigsaw Puzzles of 3D Scans
description:
Welcome to Puzzling Places - Beta, a FREE pre-release game! Puzzling Places is a relaxing and wholesome 3D jigsaw puzzle game where players put together hyper-realistic miniatures of beautiful places from around the globe. With a meditative and calm atmosphere, the game focuses on achievable challenges and a tangible feeling of progression and completion. With every piece puzzled, each “place” slowly comes to life with an immersive and serene soundscape and visuals. Puzzling Places is a modern take on an age-old pastime that’s fun for the whole family, thanks to its simple rules and easy controls. Puzzling Places is currently under development and planned to be released for Oculus Quest & Quest 2 this summer as well as other platforms later on. Puzzling Places - Beta includes: - Ice Cream Stairs - (20 pieces) - Boat Josefa - (100 pieces) - Devil’s Slide Bunker - (100 pieces) - Tsuruga Castle - (100 pieces) - Tatev Monastery - (200 pieces) - Market Square in Gliwice - (200 pieces) ----------

34+ NEW PUZZLES on [PATREON](https://www.patreon.com/PuzzlingPlaces)!
Want to play new puzzles? Join our [Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/PuzzlingPlaces) to play new *Test Puzzles* every week and give feedback on our [Discord](https://discord.gg/G5R5Q9E).
----------

Discord
We have a ton of feature ideas and more puzzles to make, so if you have ideas + feedback, tell us in our [Discord](https://discord.gg/G5R5Q9E)

name: Descent Alps
summary: Adrenaline and flow in the slopes.
description:
_**Descent Alps**_

**Note:** This is a pre-release demo version of Descent Alps!

_**News**_

Descent Alps Demo is now hosted on Oculus App Lab! Follow the link and add the game to your Quest library.
No more unknown sources yay:)!

_**Status**_

We're hard at work creating the full game based on all the awesome feedback we've received from this pre-release.

Descent Alps will get a paid release in Q1 2021! The main features of the paid release will be:

- Option to challenge ghosts of specific players and holders of top spots in the high score charts.
- 2 – 3 new courses of finished game level quality.
- More songs added to the soundtrack.
- New graphics for scoreboard/challenge

 -- Histograms things such as speed, score, and rhythm to better gauge your performance.



_**Description**_

Looking down the slopes of a steep mountain with a pair of skies strapped to your feet is exhilarating.
You will learn to overcome even the most challenging of descents by feeling the rhythm of the slope and finding the correct lines.
The layered mechanics make Descent Alps enjoyable and comfortable for people new to VR as well as rewarding for the dedicated players.

_**Controls**_

In Descent Alps, skiing is controlled with motion of the whole body.
You shift your body weight and lean into the curve.
You hunch down to carve the skies and make quick turns.
Think of your body as a joystick.

_**Development**_

Descent Alps is in active development. The goal is to create a comfortable VR experience with focus on traversal of the environment.
I'm hoping to gather feedback and gain insight that can help make the game totally awesome!

_**Privacy policy**_

https://www.sutur.io/privacypolicy

name: Range Day VR
summary: Too lazy to go to the range? Is your gun in the repair shop? Never fear Range Day VR is here.
description:
Quest port of our published Rift game. Updated frequently

https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/1249428591772689/?locale=en_US

YOU MUST BE USING THE LATEST VERSION OF SIDEQUEST TO INSTALL. PLEASE READ INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS BELOW BEFORE BUYING.

For detailed purchase and setup instructions please visit our community forum group at https://sidequestvr.com/community/24

If you like playing with realistic guns in an open VR sandbox, then this might be the game for you. Range Day VR is designed to give players a taste of what an actual gun range is like while letting players explore iconic realistic firearms without danger of shooting the family cat. Compete against other players in challenging timed events. Or simply enjoy blowing things up with your favorite .50 cal machine gun.

Range Day VR features several authentic firearm models as we have obtained permission from the manufactures for use in game. We also have plenty of other fantasy and facsimile modern firearms to expand your sandbox destruction as well.

This game will be constantly evolving, adding new guns, ranges, and new features frequently that may cause technical issues or bugs, especially while we implement cross platform multiplayer support. With all that said we hope you enjoy our small slice of VR fun and come along for the ride.

Game Features

Roomscale VR Experience designed for the Oculus Quest. 16+ indoor and outdoor ranges in various day and night settings. Timed challenges with reactive ranges. More than 50 weapons to shoot. More added frequently.

name: Disc Benders: Ace Run
summary: Play disc golf in virtual reality. Throw the disc skillfully and bend your way to the basket.
description:
> ## **Disc Benders** is the best disc golf experience for virtual reality

###### Launch powerful drives, curve the disc, and sink long putts in this realistic discing game

- Play in a space with advanced frisbee flight modelling, reactive physics simulations, and fully-realized collision systems​
- Practice throws at the driving range and learn from tutorials that will teach you how to play from A to Z
- Preview each hole before you play | Look at the map and use the immersive fly-through feature​
- Reach in your disc bag and pull out your favorite disc for each unique scenario you encounter​ 

##### Now boasts three full courses, with over 40+ holes to play, five unique disc types to choose from,
##### and two game modes: **Free Play** &  **Career Mode**
###### **| Free Play**
- Sharpen your skills on the course with the freedom to practice any shot from any where, including throwing from atop your floating cloud!
- Unlimited callbacks on the disc will ensure you are able to take back bad throws, and continue retrying them until you finally hit that illusive line
- Able to directly go to any hole on the course, allowing you to refine your play and scores on difficult holes

###### **| Career Mode**
- Every throw counts. No callbacks on the disc  - Once you throw, you must play where the disc lies
- Will track your lifetime stats like personal best scores and putting percentages, saving these across play sessions
- Forces you to stay within range from your lie when throwing, making each throw have meaning and purpose

##### Review your course play at the post-game review board
- See all the throws you made for each hole - What disc you used, it's distance thrown, and the flight path it made on the map.
- Study your scores this round compared to your career bests
- Learn from your play style, what discs you prefer, and the risk/reward decisions you made on the course

-------------------

##### **Multiplayer Update**
- Bend alongside up to 4 of your friends (and others) as you keep score and socialize on the course
- Customize your avatar with your own nickname and colors so you can be flying high in style
- Play on a challenging, eccentric course at the mountainous ***Cloud 9 Resort***, boasting new and improved basket designs
- Experience the smoother throwing motion and release, with the significant change in gripping control scheme

-------------------

##### **!! Aesthetics Update !!**
- Upgraded visuals, including new discs and bag models, repainted all courses, improved lighting
- Elegant & smart disc trails that track your turn/fade values mid-flight
- Hole Highlighter now shows basket, bounds, and new guide that weaves through the fairway
- Improved ground play, with spike, skip, and sliding shots interacting with ground textures
- Brand new 9-hole course ***Dream Drop Bends*** that will test your ability to throw flexes and high elevation shots

-------------------


**_This purchase will gain you access to future updates, releases, and online multiplayer modes_**

**_This purchase provides you with both the Quest and Rift versions of the game_**

name: Arcaxer Demo
summary: Arcaxer is an action turn based RPG inspired by games like Paper Mario and Undertale.
description:
### A Turn Based Action RPG! Arcaxer is a turn based RPG with first person action oriented combat, and a 3rd person god-view overworld.

### Buy the full version on the Oculus Store! https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/5396412860376470/

In the overworld you will explore procedural dungeons to find equips and new abilities for your character. You can also explore the hub world to interact with NPC's and buy new items with the credits that you earn in the dungeon.

Even though combat is turn based you must dodge enemy attacks with your body, and aim and time your own attacks with gestures. Can you make it to the top of "The Stack"?

#### Player Classes Choose fighter, thief, or mage to drastically change which abilities you learn as you explore the dungeons.

* Fighter: A class with a focus on physical attacks * Mage: A class with a focus on Hax, the game's special abilities. * Thief: A class that requires skill and precision to use properly #### Procedurally Generated Dungeons The Stack is a huge procedurally generated dungeon filled with random enemies and loot. The dungeon changes as you get higher including more dangerous traps and enemies. This is an early demo of a game in development and may have bugs, balance, and performance issues.

#### Join the discord to get early builds and more! https://discord.gg/BCqy2m3
#### Latest Major Update: 1.34.1 Key Changes:


* Difficulty Modes * Voice Acting * Rebalanced drop rates. * New weapons!

### Buy the full game here:
https://sidequestvr.com/app/1217/arcaxer-pre-release

If you enjoy the game please leave feedback at :
http://www.reddit.com/r/Arcaxer
#### Add Arcaxer to your Steam wishlist!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1354540/Arcaxer/

Also if you want to support development consider donating for preview builds with more content!
https://www.patreon.com/Arcaxer

name: Warriors of Titus
summary: Warriors of Titus is a strategy focused first-person MOBA (Mutliplayer Online Battle Arena)for VR.  Finally you can be immersed in a MOBA as you battle to reclaim Titus.
description:
Gameplay description

Each match is played between two teams of three players with each team defending their own separate base on the map. Either team wins by being the first to destroy the opposing team's base. Each player will control a powerful Warrior. The game features a growing roster of Warriors, each with their own ability set, weapons and upgrades. Players gain experience from destroying enemy Warriors, their defense towers and enemy minions that roam the lanes. This experience can be used to level up your powerful abilities in the order you choose. As the flow of each match will help you adapt your Warrior each level to help stay ahead of the fight.

Game features

  • 14 Champions (with many more in the works!)
  • Online Leaderboards
  • Cross-play between all PCVR Steam HMD's, Quest 1/2 and non VR
  • Ingame voice chat
  • Public and Private lobbies
  • AI bots (to fill out empty slots or to play single player) with multiple difficulties
  • In-game achievement system
  • Multiple locomotion styles
  • UI customizations
  • Snap turn and smooth turn
  • Customize weapon orientation to your liking
  • Adjustable Audio settings
  • - Crossplatform multiplayer - with steam ( VR and non VR PC + MAC) (link)

name: TO THE TOP
summary: VR Platforming game, that gives you the freedom to move across the environment with superhuman abilities.
description:
VR Platforming Game, that gives you the freedom to move across the environment with superhuman abilities. Conquer over 35 levels with new obstacles and challenges. Compete for the fastest times or explore the environment. Experience the freedom of movement.

"TO THE TOP is still one of the most singularly fun experiences I've ever had inside my VR headset" 9/10 - [UploadVR](https://uploadvr.com/top-review-one-best-times-can-vr/) 

"Making the leap onto your must-play list" 9/10 - Official PlayStation Magazine

### FREEDOM OF MOVEMENT
Our core motivation for creating TO THE TOP was to create a movement mechanic that is simple to use, takes advantages of VR input, and feels very comfortable to play. We spent a year testing and tuning this system, until it felt like a movement system that was not only fun to use but also opened the door to create brand new gameplay that has not been seen in platforming games before.

Climb - Grab with one hand at a time, to move across surfaces, up over or around. You can climb 360 around objects.

Leap- Grab on with both hands, look at where you want to go and release to leap. Perform consecutive leaps to build up speed and power.

Air Control - While leaping through the air, you can control your fall with the direction you are looking.

Skate - Green surfaces can be skated on. Grab them, point in the direction you want to go and skate across the surface.

Fly - Equipped with Jet Hands, you can fly through the sky.

And more 
### DEPTH OF GAMEPLAY
Inspired by classic platforming games like the Super Mario series, we wanted to distil what made the genre so great and bring these concepts back in a brand new way. With this in mind we were able to bring a new level of skill, challenge, and discovery to VR. So you can come back again and again in the pursuit of bettering your skills and master the game.

Easy to Pick Up - Controls are easy to use and do not require many buttons or gestures. New or hardcore gamers can easily jump into TO THE TOP.

Hard to Master - To earn the best times and collect all of the items. You need to master all of the movement mechanics to pounce though the levels like a robotic cheetah.

Learn the Environment - Each level can be traversed not only horizontally but vertically as well. It is important to learn these layouts and figure out the best paths through the levels.

Challenging Obstacles - Each new level brings a new challenging obstacle to overcome ranging from Wall Runs to a giant moving robot you need to climb.

Hidden Areas - Discover hidden paths in each level to earn a Medal.

### HOURS OF CONTENT
TO THE TOP is the start of something great and we wanted to make sure players had a complete package of a game with hours of content to discover

35 Levels to Play - Each level brings new challenges and environments to discover.

Over 30 Customizable Options to Unlock - Customize your robot ranging from hands, torso, and head.

3 Time Goals to Conquer Per Level - Each level has multiple time goals that range in difficulty.

2 Collectable Goals Per Level - Take your time and explore each level to discover Geoms to collect and a Hidden Medal.

### SOUNDTRACK
TO THE TOP was made in Austin, TX and we were inspired by the local music that is a part of our scene. We are fortunate to have their music on the TO THE TOP soundtrack. So make sure to play with headphones on and turn it all the way up!

Musical Artists

Capyac

Mirror Mask

Night Drive

Slooom

Sip Sip

Language Support for: Arabic, Chinese (China), Chinese (Hong Kong), Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French (Canada), French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian (Nynorsk), Polish, Portuguese (Brazil), Portuguese (Portugal), Russian, Spanish (Mexico), Spanish (Spain), Swedish, Turkis

name: V-Speedway Alpha
summary: Arcade racing and drifting!
description:
V-Speedway is an arcade racing game with plenty of opponents and long winding racetracks, running at native refresh rate on Quest devices. Race against a a full grid of cars or improve your records!

[Discord server] --- [Changelogs]

Want to share your Time Attack times? We have a friendly leaderboard in the Discord server!

Update v0.6.2 available!
-----
- **In this version:** new UI style to reflect the App Lab version, a critical fix to framerate and fixes to other issues.
- **Coming soon:** improved AI, improved menus, accessibility options.
- **In later updates:** first official racetrack and car, with higher quality models and redesigned graphics.

Current version
-----
This is a free prerelease alpha showcasing the development of the game and base gameplay, and it's currently made of **placeholder** assets only. It will stay like this until finalized assets and features will be added, then will continue to live on as a free demo on SideQuest.

Release plan
-----
Once the project reaches v1.0, it will be sold either via Quest main Store or the upcoming Off-Store. The first iteration of V-Speedway will be a small but complete game mixing arcade driving with real world inspired races, featuring the following:

- Three very different cars, each from a different era and class.
- Three racetracks, each with short and long variants.
- Single Race and Time Attack mode.
- Additional class-specific game modes.
- Various liveries for cars, helmet, suit and gloves.
- Online leaderboards.

Future plan
-----
After v1.0 is out, I will add content to the game depending by player interest, downloads and ultimately sales. I'd love to add Online Multiplayer soon after, followed by more cars, tracks, and in general more features.

**Thanks for stopping by, see you on the racetrack!**

[Changelogs]: https://github.com/DanjelRicci/V-Speedway/releases
[Discord server]: https://discord.gg/cHtPANW

name: VRWorkout - Total home fitness
summary: Train Longer - Train Harder - Train Better
description: ### VR Fitness Insider review https://www.vrfitnessinsider.com/review/vrworkout-game-review/ ## Full-body rhythm fitness game Transform your living room into a personal gym with VRWorkout and hand tracking **Jumping // Squatting // Pushups // Side Planks // Crunches // Running // Sprinting and Burpees** **Please leave a review if you want to support the development of this game** ### Heart rate sensor support You can connect a heart rate sensor to the game via the VRHealth Institute smartphone app. The heart rate will be shown during the workout and you can tell the game to adjust the intensity based on your heart rate **This feature is experimental** Instructions for setting up the heart rate sensor: https://github.com/mgschwan/VRWorkout/wiki/VRHealth-connection ### VRWorkout online portal Store, analyze or export your exercise sessions. Online Portal is still in an early stage and only available to patrons (see Patreon link) Here is an example of a workout: https://portal.vrworkout.at/share/4bd1b36021f14b8a83dc0ed38bef9090/ ### How to play Please enable hand tracking on your Oculus Quest and play with **OPEN PALMS** for optimal results **DISCLAIMER: Use at your own risk! This game does not check if you bump into your surroundings. There is a lot of movement involved since this is a physical workout game, which bears the risk of injury. Always use common sense when performing the movements inside the game. If you feel that some exercise are too dangerous DO NOT PERFORM them. You acknowledge that this software is free and you are using it at your own risk** * Try to hit the hand cues to the beat of the music. Play with **open palms** to improve tacking. * The head cue has to be touched with your head. Just touch it, you don't need for headbutting * Run in place to receive point multipliers! * If you want to switch out an exercise during play double tap the new exercise twice in the exercise selector to your right. The optimal time to hit the cues is when the marker that rotates around the cue touches the second one. Upon start you will see several different blocks. Touch one of them at the desired difficulty spot to select a level and difficulty. To disable exercises switch them on/off with the switches to your left. Exiting a stage during play: On the top of the left blue pole is a sign to exit a stage. **Play with your own music in Freeplay mode*** Put on some music in the background (maybe using the nullnMusic player) and hit the blue drum in the main menu to the beat of the music. Once the beat is set select one of the freeplay modes to your right. They will send the cues according to the BPM you set but without playing any music. Or upload your own OGG files to **/sdcard/Music/Workout** (case sensitive) ### Current features: * 4 difficulty levels * Custom songs (put OGG files in **/sdcard/Music/Workout** ) * Song playlist. Play several songs in a row * Automatic player height detection * In-game recentering for headsets that don't have a recenter option * Audio instructions that tell the player when to switch positions * Increase points by running in place or by moving more * Hand tracking * Freeplay mode without music, so you can play to your own background music * Predefined exercise sequences * Experimental battle mode. Use your workout to defeat your opponent * Experimental heartrate integration (Beta testers only). * Experimental VRWorkout online portal integration to store and analyze workouts (Beta testers only) ### Get involved **For feature requests and feedback visit the VRWorkout discord** **https://discord.gg/Vg3vyah** Or send a message to **dev@vrworkout.at** **Game updates:** **v0.9.9p** * Fix controller positions **v0.9.9o** * Add MP3 support * Add SideQuest Profile linking * Add basic support for SideQuest achievements * Add Fitness Week challenge **v0.9.9n** * Add playlist mode * Add SideQuest Fitness Week song * Add "Warrior Songs" album from TheFatRat * Adjust windmill exercise * Add Skip Exercise button * Add setting to disable windmill gestures **v0.9.9l** * Fix the hand position in hand tracking mode (hand is no longer at the wrist) * Move attack/defense menu behind ht player **v0.9.9h** * Add squat jump * Add experimental battle mode **v0.9.9e** * Special cues after a hit streak * New windmill move * Fix bug in battle mode saving **v0.9.9b** * Performance update **v0.9.8z** * New songs * Better balanced scoring * High intensity side planks with follow up pushup * Improved timing of the burpees * Add overall workout score * Instructor motivation on longer streaks * Improve double swing cues * Better visibility of the point indicator * Option to extend the exercise switch time for floor to stand transitions ( active be default ) **v0.9.8s** * Exercise sequences (i.e. pyramid workout) * Online portal (Beta testers only) **v0.9.8k** * Exercise presets * Strength mode (switch between strength and cardio) * Equalizer **v0.9.8a** * Sprint exercise added * New song selection menu * Kneesaver mode added * Custom songs * Experimental heartrate integration * Visual improvements **v0.9.5** * Add in session exercise selector **v0.9.4** * Introducing burpees **v0.9.3** * Introducing side planks **v0.9.1** * Difficulty adjusted for pushups and crunches **v0.9 Full beast mode** * Enemies will randomly attack and can only be fended off with extended claws if beast mode is enabled. **v0.8.3 Jumping update** * Try to hit the cues by jumping, similar to jump rope jumping. **v0.8.1 Beast mode** Introducing beast mode (just eye candy for now without gameplay function). Unleash your inner Wolverine by extending your claws (activate in the menu, then make a fist to extend the claws)

name: Song Beater: Quite My Tempo!
summary: VR rhythm game on steroids – fitboxing, free style weapons, multiplayer, custom songs and videos...
description:
Song Beater is a VR rhythm/fitness game on steroids for **Quest** and **Quest 2** (90 fps supported) now available on Oculus App Lab!
(Wanna try it before buying? Here's a [FREE DEMO](https://playito.itch.io/song-beater-quite-my-tempo#demo) :-))

Beat challenging songs with your bare fists in Fit Boxing mode, wield variety of weapons (blades, tonfas, phasers, staff, saw) in Free Style or dominate the playfield in Real 360 mode!
* 6 game modes, singleplayer and multiplayer
* 60+ songs and videos included, custom songs support
* Global and friends leaderboards, unique family party mode
* Player achievements and statistics including estimated calories burnt for your fitness goals

###### Features
* 5 difficulty levels (light, gentle, normal, intense and... impossibru)
* 8 different environments
* Unique handmade visualization for each song
* Several types of laser obstacles, stationary and moving
* Variable song speed (90–150%), one-hand play, no-fail option and more
* Video playback
* 30 achievements
* Hidden and not so hidden cultural references, memes, easter eggs... :)
* Variety of weapons (blades, tonfas, phasers, staff, saw) and different techniques for perfect play

###### Custom songs and videos
* Use built-in download button on Custom songs tab to download new songs from our server or visit any 3rd party community servers with songs in ModSaber (Beat Saber) format! E.g. BSaber.com, Beat Sage AI
* Simply copy whole song directory to "Custom songs" directory in Song Beater (VR-headset\internal storage\Android\data\com.playito.songbeater\CustomSongs) or use SideQuest for this task (it will download and extract the song from ZIP archive for you). Then start the game, your song should appear on Custom songs and/or Videos tab.

Visit our website [SongBeater.com](http://SongBeater.com) for more information!

**Version 4.1:**
New fitness watch on your hand showing daily calories goal (which you can set in your profile), gameplay tips with scoring explanation for each mode and weapon. Graphics and gameplay improvements (orbs are better rotated towards your hands and leave color trail even for custom colors, calculations are more precise), new effects settings (you can also turn effects off completely)

**Version 4.0:**
New graphics, content, features: 60+ songs and videos included, 9 different environments, voice-chat and custom songs and videos in multiplayer, "The Club" mode for intense calories burning. More details in news feed below:

name: Nanome
summary: The Future of Molecular Design - From drug discovery to chemistry class, Nanome is a powerful tool for research and education. Visualize, build, and simulate chemical compounds, proteins, and nucleic acids like never before. Collaborate remotely in real-time.
description:
Step into Nanome and experience the world at the molecular level. From drug discovery to chemistry class, Nanome is a powerful tool for research and education. Visualize, design, and simulate chemical compounds, proteins, and nucleic acids like never before. Collaborate remotely in real-time, save workspaces, and share. Leading pharmaceutical and biotech companies use Nanome to accelerate drug discovery and collaborate with distributed teams across the globe. Educators at top universities use Nanome to teach chemistry in virtual reality, allowing students to explore shapes of proteins and drug compounds and to learn how these structures explain function.

Features: 
• Load from RCSB, PubChem, Drugbank or from your local computer
• Host a password protected room
• Join private rooms
• Save VR workspaces
• Assign presenter & block users
• Export molecules in PDB/SDF format
• Play Trajectory Animations
• Multi SDF Ligand support
• Electron Density Map Support (CCP4 & DSN6)
• Load unlimited molecules 

Nanome is available on all the major VR stores such as Oculus, Steam, and Viveport.

Download Nanome today and experience the future of molecular design.

Official Documentation Site: https://docs.nanome.ai

name: Evryway Visualiser
summary: Enter the music
description:
## Enter the Music with Visualiser.

Sit back. Relax. Enjoy your favourite music surrounded by audio-reactive visual effects.

* Play any audio track on your Quest.
* Loads of different effects.
* Play any audio track from DLNA media servers on your network (including Plex, Synology, QNAP and many more).
* Supports MP3, WAV and selected other formats.
* HearThis.At integration.
* Laid-back mode for when you need to really lay back.
* Hand Tracking support - put those controllers down, you don't need them.
* Quest 2 supported - 90Hz mode available!

##### Version **0.136**

Maintenance update. Unity 2020.3, OVR integration V25.0, switch to Vulkan.

Important! This version of Visualiser (0.130+) is also compatible with Oculus App Lab.
To allow this, the bundle ID is different to previous versions. If you have the old version on the headset,
you can now uninstall it - look for "com.Evryway.EvrywayVisualiser" under Unknown Sources,
and select "uninstall".

The new bundle ID is "com.evryway.visualiser.oal" - if you see that version, keep it!

With this version (and all future versions) you can now install the app via the Oculus Store,
and that's the recommended way to do things now. A purchase on Itch comes with an Oculus key. Rdeem the code
on the Oculus store, and install.

Of course, you can still install the APK via SideQuest. Check out the installation instructions for more details:

https://www.evryway.com/apps/evrywayvisualiser/instructions/installation



##### Feedback

Visualiser is under active development - one year on, and going strong. We love hearing feedback and suggestions. Come say hi on [Discord](https://discord.gg/6CUbFxw) and tell us what you think!

name: MarineVerse Cup - Sailing
summary: Yacht & dinghy racing in VR
description:
Try sailing in VR. Learn how to sail and race in iconic locations.

MarineVerse Cup offers competitive sailing in virtual reality. It is authentic, but approachable ( with series of tutorials that will show you the ropes ).

Join a community of VR sailors competing in thrilling yacht races everyday.

Requires a MarineVerse account to race, but you can try sailing without an account.

Do you have feedback or questions? Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/TjMkqzd

We are working on better tutorial / on-boarding - in the meantime, please watch: 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a2zDNAK97uc ( Yacht )

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VZ8QZJp7sQ0 ( Dinghy )

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mP8EgmrV0dI ( First impressions & Sailing terms )

name: ENHANCE - 2 New Games!
summary: ENHANCE VR offers a daily brain training workout of short, fun, and intense games designed by neuroscientists to test and train your cognitive skills.
description:
ENHANCE VR offers a daily brain training workout of short, fun, and intense games designed by neuroscientists to test and train your cognitive skills, including: 1. Memory 2. Attention 3. Flexibility 4. Problem solving 5. Motor control 6. Spatial orientation 7. Information Processing

Play daily, or as frequently as you can, and track your progress over time with reporting tools that let you know how your quality of sleep and moods affect your cognitive performance.​

* Start working out your brain today!

Disclaimer: as part of the registration process, we collect personal and demographic data that is in no shape or form used other than for research purposes. Our data collection policy is strictly compliant to GDPR and HIPAA privacy and security regulations, in which your personal data is anonymized and kept secure.

Enhance Version History: https://website.virtuleap.dev/changelog

name: Oxygen Dreams
summary: Oxygen Dreams is a voxelized FPS/ Platform game with free locomotion
description:
In his dreams, Evan is still a child. In his dreams he remembers remote places, deserts of colors, melodies and strange creatures ... a world where his fantasies and nightmares come true.
No, it is not a feeling of nostalgia ... in this world he always has the certainty that growing up is ... boring.

name: PLAY'A VR Video player
summary: Play’a is the versatile Virtual Reality Video Player created to match a busy lifestyle.
description:
Exclusive to users that don’t like complications - Play’a is the versatile Virtual Reality Video Player created to match a busy lifestyle. Whether its a Simple and Intuitive Interface, a very Hip Contemporary Design, Playback from Local File Storage or Streaming from the Network Connected Servers, Play’a does it right and it does it with style! Navigation is easy in and out of VR. Just jump on a couch and turn it on - you are ready to go! At their fingertips, the users like you will find:
- 2D, 3D, flat, 180° and 360° Videos automatically recognized
- All Video Formats Supported
- Intuitive user interface
- Shake smoothing
- Privacy modes
- Convenient folder navigation
- Picture adjustments: brightness, contrast, saturation
- VR Video adjustments: tilt, height, zoom, playback speed

Just download and see it for yourself ! ;)

Uninstall the previous version when upgrading to version 1.6.3

name: Perpetuum Mobilé
summary: Perpetuum mobilé is a infinite flyer where you need to avoid obstacles while flying faster and faster in a retro vector style
description:
Perpetuum Mobile is a ode to the games in vector graphics found in the arcade in the 70's , 80's and on some home consoles.

You are the pilot of the infinite flyer Perpetuum Mobile and the last chance for the human race. So fly thru the tunnels of doom that the evil empire has created and destroy the army of villains, while trying to survive the dangerous maze and landscape.

name: Blobby Tennis
summary: It's a beach volley ball game but with a racket and a tennis ball against a blobb.
description:
In Blobby Tennis you are standing in a relaxing beach scene, controlling a tennis racket and ball. You can do tricks, play the ball back and forth over the net with Blobby or outplay him to score points. Because beach sand isn't very bouncy this is obviously no real tennis, but open ended play with a ball without fixed rules or goals.

Blobby Tennis is using a custom game engine using Vulkan for rendering, so it might crash or have other strange issues. I'd appreciate reports about such issues to supportATslindev.com.

name: SweeperVR
summary: Flag, count, and open cells in this fully 3D, yet familiar, reinvention of the classic game!
description:
Minesweeper has finally come to Virtual Reality! Flag, count, and open cells in this fully 3D reinvention of the classic game.

Features:
  • - View the entire minefield in cube view, or highlight an individual plane
  • - Fully customizable minefield spawning parameters, with difficulty presets
  • - Drag, drop, scale, and rotate the minefield to locate mines from any angle
  • - Standard game mechanics and timer

Professional mine-defusers and newbies alike will be able to enjoy the challenges and gameplay of SweeperVR!

name: Deisim
summary: The virtual reality god simulator
description:
Deisim is a modern take on classic god games like populous or black and white but designed with roomscale VR in mind.

You can build you own world from scratch and help mankind to evolve from the stone age to the industrial revolution.
Perform miracles and provide them the needed resources or make them suffer with disasters.

You can do what you want in Deisim. You are in charge and nobody will judge your actions,
but you must take care of the heresy slowly corrupting your people and converting them to the false god.

You are the all mighty, but humans are the source of your power.

name: Crisis VRigade
summary: Crisis VRigade is a virtual reality action filled first person shooter that lets players take on the role of a SWAT trooper and deal with terrorist situations
description:
Crisis VRigade is a virtual reality action filled first person shooter that lets players take on the role of a SWAT trooper and deal with terrorist situations.

Play solo or team with your friends with the Co-op Multiplayer mode!

Duty calls! You’re put in the middle of the action. It's a dirty job but someone has to do it. Together with a SWAT team you will have to deal with the situation and take care of the terrorists. Your mission is cristal clear: finish off all hostile elements and keep your teammates and hostages alive. Make your away through to the terrorist who threaten to kill the hostages if their demands are not met.

Be aware of your ammunition and take cover while reloading your gun or you will be exposed and is over: maybe you see the bullet comming, maybe you didn’t, but the terrorist got away and your partners now have the unpleasant task of giving the bad news to your nearest relative.

You got the highest rates at the academy, it’s time to prove it!

name: Art Gate
summary: Art Gate is a social art market in virtual reality.
description:
Exhibitors from North America, South America, Africa, Europe, Asia, and Australia actively curate and host social art events in Art Gate. Erin Loree and Alex McLeod are among the contemporary artists on exhibition.  Masters such as Cindy Sherman, Pablo Picasso, Louise Nevelson, and many other artists in between can be found in Art Gate as well. All the exhibitions are open to the public for free. 

***Join social art events***
***Buy and sell artwork***
***Connect with international artists, collectors, and galleries***

Download our desktop apps here: www.artgatevr.com/download
For our social event schedule visit: www.artgatevr.com/programming

name: Home Plate Baseball App Lab
summary: Home Plate Baseball is a baseball simulator and mini-game collection for VR HMD with motion controllers.
description: 3 Inning Baseball, Home Run Derby, Catching, Umpire Simulator, and Shooting all included.  There is a hard mode with pitches up to 100 mph.  #HomePlateBaseball, @Beep2Bleep, Web@Beep2Bleep.com

name: Pick-up League Hockey
summary: Pick-up League Hockey is a 3 vs 3 player multiplayer hockey simulator with realistic skating physics and a full size rink.
description:
NOTE: If you have a Quest/Quest2, be sure to get the applabs version here: http://hockeyvr.me

Experience hockey in VR like you've never seen it before! Full-speed, 100 percent skill-based hockey. Play in cross-region multiplayer using single and dual-hand stick control, haptics, and more!!

Join our discord server for news, tournaments, and more: https://electricfalcon.net/discord

WE ARE NOW ON OCULUS QUEST APP LABS! 

http://hockeyvr.me

Update: New goalie models!
